title: AI-Driven Solutions for Healthcare
organisation: International Conference on AI in Healthcare 2023
description: Introduced a novel AI approach to assist healthcare professionals in diagnostics.
Used machine learning to identify patterns in patient data.
Achieved 95% accuracy in predicting specific health conditions.
Recognized by peers for impactful research.

title: VR for Enhanced Learning
organisation: Journal of Virtual Reality in Education, 2022
description: Explored the use of VR in educational environments.
Highlighted benefits of immersive learning for complex subjects.
Presented evidence of improved retention rates among students.
Received positive feedback from educational institutions.
